title: [4] Two Problems
contents: That hot new gang that's shaking up the whole city is on the move again.
And this time, it looks like they're after old NASDA stuff.
Apparently, those guys are stacked with pre-bomb tech. Tanks and stuff that make our technicals look like toys.
And as if things could get any worse, apparently ANOTHER new gang just took out the guys settled around NASDA Central.
Just like that! It didn't even take them a day.
I don't know what their deal is. Maybe they're working together?
Whatever it is, it's probably bad news for us.
I used to think setting up around this old uplink would keep us safe.
But now it's just putting a huge target on our heads.
I'd like to think we're the roughest and toughest guys around, but if either of those groups make a serious move on us...
I don't know if we'll make it.
